articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
Re 据 Beosin Alert，LeetSwap 上的 axlUSD/WETH 交易对遭价格操纵攻击，损失约 62 万美元。该攻击利用了配对合约中的 _transferFeesSupportingTaxTokens 函数，允许任何人在配对合约中转账 axlUSD，从而导致代币价格上涨。然后攻击者就可以出售代币以获取利润。
https://twitter.com/BeosinAlert/status/1686217193980342272?s=20

Beosin Alert: The axlUSD/WETH pair of @LeetSwap on BASE was subject to a price manipulation attack, with losses of ~$620,000. 
The attack exploited the _transferFeesSupportingTaxTokens function in the pair contract, which allows anyone to transfer axlUSD in the pair contract, leading to an…
articles.title: Re 据 Beosin Alert，LeetSwap 上的 axlUSD/WETH 交易对遭价格操纵攻击，损失约 62 万美元。该攻击利用了配对合约中的 _transferFeesSupportingTaxTokens 函数，...

Delphi Digital: 3/ On @fraxfinance, Egorov currently has 59m $CRV supplied against 15.8m FRAX of debt. 
Though this is much less CRV collateral and stablecoin debt than his Aave position, it poses a larger risk to CRV due to Fraxlend’s Time-Weighted Variable Interest Rate.

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
Re https://twitter.com/EmberCN/status/1686195024105775104

余烬: 兄弟们，a16z 的 $MKR 终于全部转出啦😂
3 小时前，a16z 两个地址将最后的 6586 MKR($8.1M) 转出。按前面转出情况，这笔 MKR 也将会在接下来几天分批转入 Coinbase。
这样 a16z 地址的 MKR 持续转出迎来大结局： 37,518 MKR($46.14M) 用近一个月的时间全部转入 Coinbase。
推文由 @LionDEX_CN 赞助
articles.title: Re https://twitter.com/EmberCN/status/1686195024105775104
